name: PaymentCloud
description: High-risk payment setup for CBD, vape, and supplement brands with recurring billing and fraud tools.
target_audience_match: Perfect for frustrated founders switching from Stripe or PayPal who need real billing and fast approval.

name: Easy Pay Direct
description: Trusted by high-risk industries, with Shopify/WooCommerce support and compliance-first billing.
target_audience_match: Ideal for stressed CBD founders needing stable WooCommerce integration and proactive legal support.

name: PayKings
description: CBD-specialized processor with recurring billing, 100+ bank partners, and WooCommerce/Chargebee support.
target_audience_match: Great for global CBD brands tired of platform limitations and looking to scale subscriptions.

name: Soar Payments
description: Fast approval and transparent pricing for CBD merchants with subscription billing and WooCommerce plugins.
target_audience_match: Perfect for small, overwhelmed CBD startups wanting a quick, compliant launch.

name: NMI + Organic Payment Gateways
description: CBD-focused gateway stack with subscription billing, API access, and Shopify/Chargebee plugins.
target_audience_match: Great for hands-on brands needing full-stack checkout control without vendor lock-in.

name: Durango Merchant Services
description: Veteran high-risk gateway with CBD-friendly underwriting and recurring payment support.
target_audience_match: Ideal for high-volume CBD merchants needing stable terms and predictable underwriting.

name: DigiPay Solutions
description: Fraud-resistant gateway for CBD and supplement brands with recurring support and stable integrations.
target_audience_match: Perfect for fast-scaling DTC teams worried about chargebacks and transaction fraud.

name: Instabill
description: CBD and supplement payment processor with global merchant account access and recurring billing options.
target_audience_match: For brands rejected by U.S. processors who need reliable international accounts.

name: Organic Payment Gateways
description: Stripe alternative for CBD brands with recurring billing and Shopify, Wix, and WooCommerce support.
target_audience_match: Perfect for brands burned by Stripe shutdowns and needing stable CBD billing.

name: Inovio
description: PCI-compliant CBD payment gateway with fraud filters, hosted checkout, and recurring support.
target_audience_match: Great for lean teams needing low-code compliance and fraud protection baked in.

name: GreenLeaf Payment Solutions
description: CBD-specialized provider with full subscription stack and Shopify/WooCommerce plugins.
target_audience_match: Perfect for hybrid retail/DTC brands juggling storefronts and online CBD billing.

name: Zen Payments
description: High-risk payment processor built for CBD with recurring billing and secure online checkout.
target_audience_match: Ideal for teams needing white-glove support for recurring CBD subscriptions.

name: Square for CBD (via Green Merchant)
description: Official Square gateway for CBD with POS and recurring invoice logic.
target_audience_match: Great for new CBD shops craving Square’s interface with high-risk approval built in.

name: eMerchant Broker
description: High-risk merchant account with CBD subscription support, fraud protection, and custom setup.
target_audience_match: Perfect for CBD brands needing elite fraud tools and personalized onboarding.

name: Pinwheel Pay
description: CBD gateway for international and multi-currency brands, with subscriptions and fraud tools.
target_audience_match: Best for global CBD sellers with complex billing setups across multiple markets.

name: Greenbox POS
description: Cannabis/CBD-native POS and gateway with subscription billing, compliance tools, and stable onboarding.
target_audience_match: Great for dispensary-style CBD setups balancing DTC and in-store billing needs.

name: Authorize.Net + High-Risk Merchant
description: Popular gateway paired with high-risk approval for CBD — used with PaymentCloud or National Processing.
target_audience_match: For dev-savvy teams building custom billing stacks with high-risk compliance.

name: Centurion Payment Services
description: CBD-friendly processor with recurring billing and multi-platform compatibility.
target_audience_match: Solid for CBD brands prioritizing billing reliability across various platforms.

name: National Processing
description: CBD subscription support via high-risk merchant onboarding and Authorize.Net compatibility.
target_audience_match: Great for mid-size CBD teams needing known platforms and fewer surprises.

name: Shift Processing
description: Subscription-capable CBD processor with basic integrations and fraud control.
target_audience_match: Ideal for bootstrapped CBD founders who need to launch billing fast and affordably.
